Alarm_Keypad.name: Alarm Keypad
Alarm_Keypad.author: Lucky Mallari

settings.label: Alarm Panel Command
settings.description: Alarm Panel Item Command receiver. This is tied to a rule.

settings.label: Off Text
settings.description:
Main Label for Off. You can change this to anything. I prefer "Patay" which means off or dead in my language. You can use simple html here such as Line1
Line2

settings.label: Stay Text
settings.description:
Main Label for Arm Stay. You can change this to anything. I prefer "Dito Lang" which means "just here" in my language. You can use simple html here such as Line1
Line2

settings.label: Away Text
settings.description:
Main Label for Arm Away. You can change this to anything. I prefer "Alis Muna" which means "Leaving.." in my language. You can use simple html here such as Line1
Line2
